Articles.Content:
Salutations everyone! ![:kiss:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_kiss.gif)

My name is Richard, I curently work as a Lead Character FX TD at Illumination MacGuff (the guys who brought the Minions to life) on a top secret project! 

I recently started my stream channel on twitch: [***Rich To The Rescue!***](http://www.twitch.tv/richardadenot)

The concept is simple, you send me your save games, and I go and rescue the Kerbals you lost on the live stream! Had 3 episodes so far, and they were all successful so far ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I'll post a thread soon to explain how to participate.

You can follow me on twitter at [**@RichardAdenot**](https://twitter.com/richardadenot)

 When geeking is not an option, I hide behind a lens and shoot the world around me. You can see my work on [**500px**](https://500px.com/richardadenot) and on my professional photography Page on twitter at [**@DitchThatSelfie**](https://twitter.com/ditchthatselfie) or on my facebook page: [**Ditch That Selfie**](https://www.facebook.com/pages/Ditch-that-selfie-Photography/358127721012249)

Thx for dropping by and see you around!
Hi. Weren't you chatting with KasperVld on a stream the other day? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

indeed I was, and i think you were here too right?

made a post talking about the stream here: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/124646-Stream-Lost-Kerbals-need-your-help!](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/124646-Stream-Lost-Kerbals-need-your-help!)

Hello, and welcome aboard!

It's good to see the streaming community growing. Good luck with all those kerbal rescues!
I didn't participate. I was just watching. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Thx Dman!

and Vanamonde, watching is participating ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I scheduled the next one. you'll find in on the calendar and here for more info:

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/calendar.php?do=getinfo&e=186&day=2015-6-13&c=2](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/calendar.php?do=getinfo&e=186&day=2015-6-13&c=2)

See you there!
